Detailed Description

MGIgesFstream is a super class for MGIfstream and MGOfstream.

MGIgesFstream holds the data for IGES, and provides a common functions to write and read IGES data.

Member Data Documentation

MGPvector<MGIgesDirectoryEntry> MGIgesFstream::m_DirectoryEntries [protected]

Directry entry data vector.

One pair of directory entry lines are stored in m_DirectryEntry[i]. m_DirectoryEntries[0] is a dummy entry and has no meaning.
